Product_Name: FACEFINITY ALL DAY FLAWLESS 3 IN 1 VEGAN FOUNDATION
Product_Details:
For a flawless, long-lasting look, there's Max Factor Facefinity All Day Flawless Foundation now with Climate Proof Protection. This 3-in-1 liquid combines a primer, concealer and foundation for up to 30 hours of wear. The lightweight & breathable vegan formula conceals redness and covers imperfections. This soft-focus, airbrushed finish foundation has climate-proof protection; waterproof, heat-proof and humidity-proof. It has SPF20 protection from damaging UVA & UVB rays, while also protecting against external agressors such asblue light and pollution. 

The smooth base holds makeup in place while the concealer covers imperfection and dark circles. The flexi-hold technology moves with your skin for a flawless, lasting finish that is transfer-proof. With 3 types of oil-absorbing powders, it perfectly glides onto and fuses with skin for quick application and a long lasting matte finish. It's available in 33 shades, with a range of undertones to help you find the perfect match for your complexion.

• 3-in-1 primer, concealer & foundation that gives an airbrushed finish
• New advanced formula is water-proof, humidity-proof and climate-proof
• SPF20 helps protect skin from the sun's damaging UVA & UVB rays, alongside blue light
• The long-lasting formula provides full coverage
• Transfer-proof, touch-proof and shine-proof with 3 types of oil absorbing powders
• Available in 33 shades to match every skin tone
• Up to 30 hours of natural looking wear
• Completely Vegan
Benefits:
It’s a 3-in-1 foundation with a built-in primer and concealer
Flexi-hold technology gives a flawless finish that lasts all day
It delivers 24-hour touch-proof and shine-proof wear
The foundation provides a matte finish with medium to full coverage
Its formula is oil-free and features SPF 20

Product_Details: Believe in miracles! Inspired by skincare, mastered by Max Factor, the new Miracle Pure Foundation is clinically proven to care for skin while you wear it. In just one minute and with just a drop it plumps your skin, letting your complexion benefit in five ways, with improved radiance, firmness, elasticity, density, and suppleness. The advanced formula is infused with 89% skin-care ingredients including, Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, and provides 24 hours hydration.
Benefits:
It’s a skin-improving foundation that conceals and cares
The advanced formula is clinically proven to give 24 hours hydration
With 89% skincare ingredients including vitamin C and hyaluronic acid
Medium, buildable coverage with SPF 30
Activator blends skincare and foundation before use

Product_Details:
A foundation that offers full coverage but doesn’t feel heavy on the skin? The Facefinity Compact Foundation is just that. Perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, it’s lightweight with a moisturising formula that contains SPF20 to hydrate your skin all day long. 

Make-Up Artist Tip: “To choose your perfect shade, match the foundation with the skin tone of your jawline. To ensure even coverage, use a compact sponge and apply the foundation to the centre of your face, blending outwards. Go over with a foundation brush for a flawless finish.”
Benefits:
Shine control
Long lasting matte finish
Lightweight formula
SPF 20

Product_Details: Want instant radiance? Show your glow with the best full coverage foundation. Miracle Touch Foundation's cream-to-liquid formula ticks all your base boxes. It's super-hydrating, lightweight and brightening on skin, while reducing redness and gliding over pores and imperfections.
Benefits:
Solid-to-liquid compact foundation
Contains hydrating hyaluronic acid
Non-comedogenic

Product_Details: Max Factor Crème Puff Powder Compact is a medium to high coverage pressed powder with a flawless matte finish. Product_Details: Whether you’re looking for a concealer which covers dark circles, want to conceal stubborn blemishes or glide over uneven skin tone, Facefinity All Day Flawless Concealer is your go-to, now available with up to 30 hours of wear that is transfer-proof. The breathable and lightweight concealer is made with a vegan formula that conceals pores and redness and covers imperfections, delivering medium to full coverage that blends very well. The soft-focus, airbrushed matte finish is climate-proof; waterproof, heat-proof, humidity-proof and sweat-proof. Available in 8 shades for the perfect match, this Max Factor concealer also boasts antioxidant properties and protects skin from blue light.
Benefits:
It's a liquid concealer with medium to full coverage for up to 30 hours of amazing coverage
Easy-to-blend, vegan formula glides onto skin, delivering a flawless, airbrushed finish

Product_Details: High definition, minimum effort. Contour in 3 easy steps. Miracle Contouring Palette is a 8-shade palette, designed by Max Factor make-up artists to suit every skin tone. Creamy soft texture allows for a quick and easy contouring look as formula is easily blendable and buildable.

Product_Details:
Reveal a sculpted glow with Miracle Glow Duo Pro Illuminator; the cream highlighter palette that adds next-level radiance in a few taps. Use the matte highlighter to perfect skin and disguise tired under-eyes, then dial up your glow with the shimmer highlighter, tapping over cheekbones, brow bones, the bridge of the nose and the cupid's bow. 
 
The smooth, easy-to-blend texture makes this creamy highlight appear ultra natural-looking, giving skin a lit-from-within effect that pairs perfectly with a dewy foundation. Customise your glow with Miracle Glow Duo Pro Illuminator, whether you're going for a sheer, matte highlight or a touch of soft-focus shimmer. 
 
•	Cream highlighter palette, featuring matte and shimmer illuminators
•	Smooth, creamy, easy-to-blend formula
•	Apply to tops of cheekbones, brow bones, the cupid's bow and the bridge of the nose

Looking for more glow-boosting tips? Read our guide on how to apply highlighter.

Lightweight formula
Designed to suit virtually every skin tone
Creamy texture

Product_Details: Get a flush of colour infused with care! Max Factor’s Miracle Pure Cream Blush contains a moisturizing complex that plumps and hydrates while adding a buildable glow to your complexion. Infused with hyaluronic acid and squalane, the formula has a lightweight, creamy and silky texture that transforms skin, giving a day-long glow that also leaves the skin looking fresh and healthy. Available in 4 luminous shades to suit all skin tones.
Benefits:
It’s a skin-improving blush that plumps and hydrates skin as you wear it

Product_Details:
The answer to a fresh-faced, healthy glow? Miracle Touch Creamy Blush. The finishing touch in your go-to base routine, dot and blend this complexion-boosting blusher cream onto apples of cheeks for instant, natural-looking radiance. Dull skin is no match for this lustrous, sheer cream blush. 

Warm the solid blush formula between fingertips to transform to a sheer, easy-to-blend cream blush. The creamy, dreamy formula is light to the touch and doesn’t feel greasy on skin. Blend outwards from apples of cheeks up to cheekbones for a natural-looking flush, or tap directly onto cheeks to build colour for a bolder finish. 

•	Sheer, buildable blush cream delivers natural-looking radiance
•	Non-greasy, lightweight formula
•	Blend onto apples of cheeks outwards for an instantly healthy-looking complexion
Benefits:
Easy to blend into skin for a lustrous yet subtle look.
Non-greasy formula gives a natural finish for all skin types.
Stays looking fresh all day.

Product_Name: MIRACLE PURE VITAMIN C SKIN-ILLUMINATING SERUM
Product_Details: Give your skin a daily boost of vitamins for an immediate healthy-looking glow with Max Factor Miracle Pure Skin-Illuminating Serum. This skin caring and improving serum has golden pearls of illuminating pigments to give skin a revitalised and brighter-looking effect. The clinically proven, vegan formula contains vitamins C and Niacinamide - B3. The multi-use serum can be used alone, under makeup, or mixed with any foundation for a skin caring boost of radiance. Inspired by nature, mastered by Max Factor.

Provides a daily boost of vitamins for hydrated, firmer-looking skin

Vegan formula contains golden pearls of illuminating pigments for an immediate skin glow

Product_Details: Creating your ultimate eyebrow makeup look is easy with Brow Shaper. Whatever your eyebrow shape, frame your face and sculpt your look for professional-looking brows at home.

Fluffy and boyish or smooth and sleek? Whip your brows into shape with the taming powers of Brow Revival eyebrow gel. This brow-plumping mascara contains tiny volume-building fibres to fill in gaps and instantly create a fuller brow finish. Meanwhile, the small-sized mascara brush allows for precise application, so you can catch every strand to boost fullness and depth - instantly. There are four shades to choose from to suit every brow shade and style, whether you’re looking for natural definition or a bold look. 
  
The nourishing brow gel is enriched with conditioning oils, caring for your brows while you tame and shape them. Sweep the long-wear formula through brows; it lasts up the 24 hours with a waterproof, smudge-proof finish. 
  
•	Brow-plumping, volume-building eyebrow gel
•	Nourishing formula with conditioning oils to give your brows some love
•	Sweep through eyebrows to fill and tame, delivering 24-hour wear
Benefits:
It lasts all day and all night and is fadeproof & smudgeproof
Helps you regain fuller looking brows.
The formula is enriched oils and fibers fills that fill the gaps
It's easy & quick to apply with mistake-proof application.
Colours, fills and tames in one stroke.

Each shade is designed with natural-toned pigments to look like your brows, only better. For instant & natural results that lasts for days.

Product_Details: For ultra-precision and bold eyes in just one stroke, there's Max Factor Masterpiece Matte Liquid Eyeliner. It's a highly pigmented waterproof liquid eyeliner that provides intense colour and up to 12 hours of wear with a matte finish. From beginners to pros, this liquid eyeliner pen draws a fine line and glides on effortlessly thanks to the high-precision tip applicator. The quick drying formula ensures a mess-free application. Sweat-proof, humidity-proof, smudge-proof, flake-proof, fade-proof and transfer-proof, the vegan formula is made from a well-balanced combination of polymeric film formers and light diffusing particles to offer a deep matte finish with great staying power. Available in 4 shades for the perfect eyeliner looks.
Benefits:
Highly pigmented, matte finish for ultra-precision and bold eyes in just one stroke
The life-proof formula is water resistant, smudge-proof and flake-proof and lasts up to 12 hours
The high-precision tip applicator makes application easy and is great for beginners or pros
It's available in 4 shades, so you'll always be able to create perfect graphic liner look with ease

Product_Details: Transform your look with bold intensity. The unique paddle-shaped tip draws both a dramatic thick line and an elegant thin line, to create the precise look you want.

Product_Details: Ultra soft pencil - gentle on delicate eye area and easy to apply. Max Factor Kohl Pencil Eyeliner is firm enough for elegant definition, yet soft enough for a sophisticated smoky eye. This easy to blend pencil takes seconds to apply and gives you an instant shot of glamour.

Product_Details: Max Factor Nude Palette is available in three colourful ultra-versatile and universally flattering eye contouring palettes. Each one features 8 perfectly paired shades so you can master the most glamorous nude eye look.  The perfectly combined eyeshadows range from pale to deep tones and allow you to contour your eyes in endless combinations - from a daily nude to a subtle smokey eye, the possibilities are truly infinite! The silky smooth formula is soft and velvety with more pigment for richer, more intense colour. It blends precisely due to the dual-tip applicator. It allows you to build and build to your heart's content, creating matte, shimmery or sparkly finishes.
Benefits:
• Three colourful palettes offer infinite possibilities for uniquely glamorous nude eye looks.

• The silky-smooth formula gives more pigment for richer, intense colour.
• Buildable eyeshadows with matte, shimmery and sparkly finishes.

From an everyday soft eyeshadow look to dramatic smokey eyeshadow makeup, the possibilities are truly endless! Reveal your extraordinary.

Product_Details: For lashes that look longer with maximised volume, there's Max Factor Masterpiece 2 In 1 Lash Wow Mascara. With a simple twist to transform, the unique twistable brush is easy to use and lets you choose your preferred look for maximum results. Separate and lengthen or lift and volumise - the choice is yours! The vegan formula contains good-for-you ingredients to help care for your lashes. Flake-free, this mascara goes on easily without clumps and will accompany you from dusk till dawn with no smudging. The long-lasting, smooth formula of this volumising and lengthening mascara is easy to apply for mess-free application that reaches from root to tip and even the inner corners. Ophthalmologically tested, this Max Factor mascara is suitable for those with sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
Benefits:
2-in-1 lengthening and volumising mascara
The twist-to-transform brush is easy to use and lets you master your desired lash look!

The smooth formula is easy to apply for mess-free application that reaches from root to tip

Product_Details: The ultimate finishing touch to your makeup: a matte lipstick. Velvet Mattes Lipstick is a full-colour, kiss-proof lipstick formula that keeps lips moisturised while delivering a soft, satin-matte finish. Glide your shade onto lips to finish any makeup look with the perfect pout. Flawless.

7 wearable shades

Product_Details:
Feel the lipstick fever! If you're a fan of the original cult-classic Colour Elixir Lipstick, you'll love the new and improved formula. Kiss hello to the perfect pout with our iconic lipstick formula, now in 29 craveable, kissable shades. Plus, our go-to lip colour has had a makeover, with brand new gold packaging to add a touch of luxe to your makeup bag. 
 
Veil lips in bold colour and a lip-loving, nourishing formula, containing a blend of emollients, antioxidants and vitamin E to care and condition. The result? Lips feel smooth and moisturised for up to 24 hours. Sweep onto lips for a hit of highly pigmented colour in a long-wear finish. Add to your lipstick wardrobe with classic reds, silky nudes, chic mauves and bold pinks, or discover your new signature shade. 
 
•	Cult-classic lipstick in 29 craveable, kissable shades

16 intense shades

Smoother, fuller-looking lips

From a subtle tint to intense colour, the buildable formula lets you create your perfect look. Reveal your extraordinary.

28 shades

Our Colour Elixir Honey Lacquer is a true triple threat: as pigmented as a lipstick, as hydrating as a lip balm and with the high shine of a gloss, this essential piece condenses 3 products into 1, making it perfect to pop into your clutch bag for a night out.

This multitasking product gives you the instant confidence of a lipstick and the irresistibility of the shine a gloss offers, whilst keeping your lips moisturised and kissable. What’s more, in 8 different shades from Honey Nude to Floral Ruby to Regale Burgan, you can rock understated nude lips or a ravishing red pout.
